title: Arcade
description: This is a webiste I made to hold all the game apps I made. Some are react most are JavaScript.

title: HYNT
description: HYNT is a pick your fate text adventure game. We used Vanilla Javascript for the front end and used Supabase for the backend.

title: PAAC angry fisch
description: PAAC is an app useing an ouutsources API to munhe certain info for diet and nutrital facts of certain Atlantic fish. This app was built with React.

title: PIXIE.js
description: Pixie.js is a tarot card API. Backend heavy with a landing page. Made on JavaScript.

title: Happy Tails
description: Happy Tails is a mono repo full stack app using the Yelp API to hit a dogpark endpoint. Wrote with full crud on React.
